description: Sensitive teen Troy Accola has to take care of his troubled mom, and work a full time job instead of going to school. On one of his lonely walks by the lake, he happens upon older fisherman Rodney Steele, who hands Troy a rod and teaches him to fish. Soon fatherless Troy is escaping his difficult life by staying at Rodney's, where he meets hot, manly couple Jaxton Wheeler and Pierce Hartman. But reality comes calling, and Troy has to choose between his idyllic life with mature Rodney or his family obligations.
title: Basement Boys Scene 2
